name: Laser Boy
overview:
INTRODUCTION
Laser Boy is a video game for Amstrad CPC 464, strongly inspired by Meat Boy (2008), created by Edmund McMillen, and Hair Boy (2016), presented by Carlos Sevila at CPCRetroDev 2016. It is the spiritual sequel to the latter It is a platform video game where the objective is to jump and shoot to overcome the different obstacles that the player will find on each map. The video game was originally developed for the CPCRetroDev 2017 contest (6th).

STORY
The protagonist of the story, Laser Boy, discovers the entrance to a cavern that he had heard of, and that few had dared to explore. Armed with his laser pistol, he decides to enter it in search of challenges and adventures. Laser Boy did not know what he was going to find inside that cavern ...
